title: Computer Networking I
description: Introduction to problems in computer networking, including error recovery, medium access, routing, flow control, and transport. Emphasis on current best practice.  Includes programming of networked applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 2200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3057 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
